document_title: Stevens Johnson syndrome (SJS): Causes, signs, treatment
subsection_content:
Diagnosis of Stevens-Johnson syndrome can be through the following ways:
Consider the affected skin and mucous membranes (appearance of at least two ulcers in the skin areas surrounding the natural openings).; According to the patient's pain level; Degree of skin damage; Skin biopsy; In some cases, the doctor may prescribe blood tests to check for infection or allergies in the patient.
